  • Constructor Details

    • Endorsement

      public Endorsement​(Account author, java.lang.String contents, Post parent) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      Constructor for endorsement objects, adds an endorsement to the parent's endorsement counter.
      Parameters:
      author - The author object corresponding to who is creating the comment.
      contents - The contents string of the comment.
      parent - The parent (Original/Comment) object that the comment is commenting on.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.
      NotActionablePostException - if the ID refers to a endorsement post. Endorsement posts are not endorsable. Endorsements are not transitive. For instance, if post A is endorsed by post B, and an account wants to endorse B, in fact, the endorsement must refers to A.

  • Method Details

    • getParent

      public Post getParent()
      Returns the parent (original/comment) post of the current endorsement post.
      Returns:
      The parent of the current endorsement object.

    • removeEndorsementFromParent

      public void removeEndorsementFromParent()
      Remove Endorsement from parent comment.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()

      toString in class Post
      Returns:
      The endorsement as a string
